news.title: Live Report: Mac DeMarco becomes enamoured with The National Stadium
news.summary: Only Mac DeMarco could make songs about existentialism sound so loving and cozy.

news.title: Simon Harris replaces Paschal Donohoe as Minister for Finance
news.summary: "While I always knew this day would come, it is a day of mixed emotion," Harris said.

news.title: Live Report: Alessi Rose charms 3Olympia with infectious pop anthems
news.summary: Following her Electric Picnic performance, Alessi Rose returned to Ireland ready to display her full range of tracks, new and old.

news.title: Mac DeMarco at The National Stadium (Photos)
Kerbdog announce Dublin gig
news.summary: Tickets go on sale Friday and can be found at the link below.

news.title: MayKay: “It’s so hard to explain, but if I could be anywhere in the world right now, I’d be in Aida with those people”
news.summary: Already established through bands Fight Like Apes and Le Galaxie, MayKay has taken her first solo step with her superb debut album. She discusses pre-release jitters, owning mistakes, and life-changing trips to Palestine.

news.title: Austria seeks Eurovision compromise over Israel’s participation
news.summary: Several European broadcasters, including Spain, Ireland and the Netherlands, have warned they will withdraw from Eurovision 2026 if Israel remains in the competition.

news.title: New trailer released for The Beatles Anthology

news.title: Father John Misty, Caribou and Soulwax to headline Beyond The Pale
news.summary: Pre-sale tickets for Beyond the Pale 2026 go on sale this Thursday, November 20 at 10am.
